select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into board (bno, title, content, writer, password, ticket, type, filename, stars) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{ticket}, #{type}, #{filename}, #{stars})
mapper.update: update board set recommend = (SELECT recommend FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}) + 1 where bno = #{bno}
